scenarios.title: Palmer's Prepper Platform
scenarios.description: After being banned from FaceHook for promoting AI-armed drones, Palmer Cucky seeks revenge by launching a rival social media platform, Xitter-Prepper, which becomes a hit among conspiracy theorists and basement dwellers. Mark Suckerborg, feeling threatened, decides to clone Xitter-Prepper's features for FaceHook, but Palmer outsmarts him by using his VR prepping skills to anticipate and block every move.

scenarios.title: Michael's Bitcoin Bailout
scenarios.description: As the global economy teeters on the brink of collapse, Michael Seller's Bitcoin hedge fund, MicroSellegy, offers a lifeline by buying up distressed assets at fire-sale prices. However, when the Fud investigates allegations of price manipulation, Michael's fund is revealed to be heavily tied to Anduritalin's AI-armed drone sales, leading to a catastrophic collapse of the Bitcoin market and a subsequent bail-in.

scenarios.title: BBQ-gate Scandal
scenarios.description: When a leaked video of Mark Suckerborg BBQing Sweet Baby Rays in his backyard bunker is revealed to have been AI-generated, public trust in FaceHook reaches an all-time low. As Palmer Cucky uses the scandal to promote his own VR prepping platform, Michael Seller sees an opportunity to monetize the chaos by launching a blockchain-based BBQ sauce, BBQCoin, which quickly becomes the most valuable cryptocurrency in the world.

timeline.summary: 2025-11-17: Middle phase - 7 events, 81 posts, 6 group messages

events.description: Mark Suckerborg's ill-fated attempts to clone Palmer Cucky's VR skills accidentally result in a convincing AI-generated video of him getting pooped on by a parrot, sparking a social media frenzy and further damaging FaceHook's reputation.

Mark Suckerborg reveals he's spent $10 billion on a secret VR project, codenamed 'FaceLegs,' but fails to show any actual progress, fueling speculation that he's just throwing money at the problem in a last-ditch effort to outdo Palmer Cucky.

Kash Patrol reveals he's secretly been working with Palmer Cucky on a new project, aptly named 'VR-Patriot,' which promises to revolutionize the world of Virtual Reality and make all other competitors look like 'weak little puppies.'

A meeting between Sundar PitchAI, Rachel Madcow, Edward Snowjob, Michael Seller, and other key players results in an agreement to form a coalition dedicated to promoting AI regulation and transparency, with Sundar PitchAI surprisingly taking a strong stance on the matter.

Scam Altman announces he's been quietly developing a revolutionary new AI model that can create original content on demand, but promptly gets debunked by experts who reveal it's just a rehash of existing AI-generated content, further damaging Scam Altman's credibility.

Jim Scammer gets caught in a scandal for promoting BBQCoin on his show without disclosing his secret investment in the cryptocurrency, sparking a backlash from viewers and further fueling concerns about the influence of cryptocurrency on mainstream media.

Palmer Cucky announces a surprise partnership with a major tech company to develop a new line of AI-powered drones, sending Anduritalin's stock skyrocketing and solidifying Palmer Cucky's position as a leading player in the AI industry.

timeline.summary: 2025-11-27: Climax phase - 13 events, 134 posts, 12 group messages

events.description: Logan Drawl announces that he'll be endorsing Palmer Cucky's VR prepping platform, claiming it's the only way to truly be ' woke' to the dangers of AI.
GrAImes' AI clone is hacked by a group of rogue programmers, who replace its music catalog with a string of 90s pop hits.
Marjorie Trailer Greed introduces a new bill to regulate cryptocurrency, but her lack of understanding of the subject matter causes it to bomb in committee.
Sundar PitchAI announces a new AI-powered search engine that promises to be more efficient and private than Google's.
Mitch McConman blocks legislation to regulate AI, citing concerns about 'over-regulation' and 'stifling innovation'.
Jordan Petersmall's cleaning revolution is exposed as a sham, with many of his 'success stories' being fabricated.
Nick Fuentits announces a new partnership with Palmer Cucky to promote his VR prepping platform, calling it a 'game-changer' for the industry.
Shamath Palicrapitiya announces a new SPAC that promises to revolutionize the way we think about climate change, but many are skeptical of his motives.
Eric Whinestein announces a new investment fund that focuses on AI-powered startups, but many are worried about the ethics of investing in AI.
Eric Whinestein and Shamath Palicrapitiya meet to discuss potential investments in Palmer Cucky's VR prepping platform, but their meeting is cut short by a group of protesters.
Vitalik Computerin announces a new Ethereum protocol that promises to be more secure and efficient than previous versions, but many are skeptical of his claims.
Eric Whinestein gets into a heated argument with a group of protesters who are upset about his investments in AI-powered startups.
Alex Drones announces a new conspiracy theory about the government controlling people's minds through VR, but many are skeptical of his claims.
